situation.title: Antigenic testing - teachers
situation.meta_description: Testing of the pedagogical has ended on 18 December 2020.

content.processed:
Regulations of the testing

The preventive antigene testing action for teachers has ended on December 18. The optional possibility to undergo an antigene test stays open for everyone within Czech public health insurance system, i.e. for teachers, too.

The test facility will issue a confirmation to each test taker that an Ag test has been performed with the result and that he or she has been instructed on what to do if it is positive / negative.

The list of testing points is available on the MZCR website. You can find the same list on the Institute of Health Information and Statistics website, where you can also view the capacity of the Covid-19 testing points. In addition, Prague has its own portal, where you can book an appointment.
